archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Embargo Party Based on Bad Debt
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Communicate with legal and regulatory parties to proceed with an embargo of the party when a delinquent party continues to not pay.

properties.value: Embargo Party Based on Bad Debt communicate with legal and regulatory parties to proceed with an embargo of the party when a delinquent party continues to not pay. An embargo is a controlled manner in which contracted products are limited under certain specific conditions. Applicable internal and regulatory parties are notified, and the part embargoed is sent an embargo warning letter. If the party decides to pay a payment can be made in full, a partial payment can be made, or the party can send bankruptcy information to the applicable parties.
